acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle POJOs with annotated field and setter
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithAnnotatedFieldAndSetter

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.AnnotatedFieldAndSetterPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the String field W1E X9P cannot be null or empty
Then string [W1E X9P] should be exactly like string [W1E X9P]
